column2: Help them? Sure. Why not? Just have them pay us.

What did you expect, Cap? You help someone today, someone else tomorrow, and the day after you don't have a ship because you ran out of spare parts right in the middle of an important repair job. If you help someone, expect something in return. Or don't help at all.
Don't let anyone call you unpractical, Sarah. Be ready for anything. Over and out.
